# General Plugin Info do not edit
base   revealjs
author Emmanuel Klinger, Ottmar Gobrecht
email  emmanuel.klinger@gmail.com, ottmar.gobrecht@gmail.com
date   2018-09-02
name   Reveal.js Slideshow Plugin
desc   Display a Wiki page as Reveal.js slideshow presentation
url    http://www.github.com/neuralyzer/dokuwiki-plugin-revealjs
